Question: This person was then elected a Fellow of Magdalen College, Oxford, where he worked for nearly thirty years, from 1925 to 1954.
Hints: In September 1913, this person enrolled at Malvern College, where he remained until the following June.
Clive Staples **** was born in Belfast, Ireland, on 29 November 1898.
This person continues to attract a wide readership.
